com.informix.jdbc

Class IfxLvarchar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.informix.jdbc.IfxObject
      • com.informix.jdbc.IfxVarChar
        • com.informix.jdbc.IfxLvarchar
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IfxImpExp, IfxJSON

    public class IfxLvarchar
extends IfxVarChar
    Support for Varchar datatypes. This class derived from IfxObject class.
